h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Azure Dust Location
content: The Azure Dust Transformation can be found in Fright Cliff - Squall Hideout in Yellow Wind Ridge. After defeating both the Mother of Stones boss and the Man-In-Stone") boss with the Stone Essence in your inventory, you will unlock the Transformation. Our walkthrough and boss guides of the Fright Cliff area will help you complete this side quest.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Azure_Dust.md', within the main section titled 'Azure Dust', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Azure Dust Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Azure Dust Transformation can be found in Fright Cliff - Squall Hideout in Yellow Wind Ridge. After defeating both the Mother of Stones boss and the Man-In-Stone") boss with the Stone Essence in your inventory, you will unlock the Transformation. Our walkthrough and boss guides of the Fright Cliff area will help you complete this side quest.
